alert.note: Alert for Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 14 at 3:22AM PST until January 15 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 12 PM TODAY TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches below 7000 feet, 1 to 2 feet above 7000 feet, and higher amounts possible above 9000 feet. Southwest winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Spring Mountains. * WHEN...From 12 PM today to 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Blowing snow could reduce visibilities. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lighter snow is expected to continue through Monday, with 3 to 6 inches of additional accumulation possible.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
